openGraph.title: Kinki Sultra Sinergi (KSS) - Indonesia–Japan Career Bridge
openGraph.description: Professional partner for Indonesian workers in Japan. Transparent, Legal, Trusted.

Header.label: Supporting Organization (SO) in Japan
Header.id_jp:
Bridge to Your Career

Indonesia – Japan

With KSS
Header.title: Kinki Sultra Sinergi
Header.description: Committed to helping Indonesian workers achieve safe, legal, and sustainable careers in Japan.

About.title: Meet
About.description: A trusted partner in bridging Indonesian workers toward professional career opportunities in Japan.

Profile.title: Company Profile
Profile.description: Kinki Sultra Sinergi (KSS) is a Supporting Organization (SO) based in Japan, focused on assisting Indonesian workers who wish to work or advance their careers in Japan. We serve as a bridge between Indonesian workers, partner schools, and Japanese companies to ensure the process runs in accordance with regulations and Japanese professional standards.

Vision.title: Vision
Vision.description: To become a trusted partner in bridging Indonesian workers toward professional and sustainable career opportunities in Japan.

items.1: Provide comprehensive support for Indonesian workers in Japan
items.2: Build strategic partnerships with companies and educational institutions
items.3: Ensure administrative processes comply with Japanese regulations
items.4: Support long-term career development for Indonesian workers

Services.title: Complete Solutions for
Services.description: We provide a wide range of professional services to support your career journey in Japan.

translator.title: Translator
translator.description: Professional interpretation & translation for official documents and business communication.

connect.title: Connect Company
connect.description: Connecting Indonesian workers with companies in Japan.

internship.title: Internship & Tokutei Ginou
internship.description: Support for internship programs and Tokutei Ginou (Specified Skilled Worker).

Partners.title: Partner
Partners.description: Collaborating with trusted schools and institutions to prepare prospective workers with adequate skills and language proficiency.
Partners.footer: We believe education is the primary foundation for career success in Japan.

Process.title: Steps Toward
Process.description: A clear and structured process to ensure your career journey runs smoothly.

1.title: Initial Consultation
1.description: Prospective participants receive a comprehensive explanation of the program and requirements.

2.title: Selection & Evaluation
2.description: Selection process based on skills, readiness, and suitability for the job field.

3.title: Document Preparation
3.description: Administrative assistance in accordance with Japanese regulations.

4.title: Job Placement
4.description: Coordination with the receiving company and departure process.

5.title: Support in Japan
5.description: Monitoring and support throughout the working period.

Testimonials.title: What Do
Testimonials.description: Real experiences from participants who have successfully built careers in Japan with KSS.

1.name: Budi Santoso
1.content: Thanks to KSS, my process of working in Japan became clearer and more directed. I felt supported from the very beginning until I started working. Very professional and trustworthy.

2.name: Siti Rahayu
2.content: Communication with the company became much easier thanks to the translator support from KSS. The team is very responsive and helpful.

3.name: Ahmad Hidayat
3.content: KSS helped me from the beginning until I could work safely in Japan. The entire process was transparent and compliant with regulations.

Contact.title: Ready to Start
Contact.description: We are ready to help you take the first step toward a professional career in Japan.

address.title: Office Address
address.subContent: BTN Pesona Alam Phase 2 Block F No.18, Kel. Anduonohu, Kec. Poasia, Kendari City

Footer.description: Professional partner for Indonesian workers in Japan. Transparent • Legal • Trusted
